channel.title: Posts on Ardenov
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ardenov

item.title: Python 101 | Chapter 0: Python Summary Sheet / Python Cheat Sheet
item.description: Learn Python from scratch with Python summary sheet / Python cheat sheet. This guide covers Python from basics to web development, data manipulation, and testing, complete with practical examples for beginners to quickly become experts.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 0: Summary Sheet / Cheat Sheet
item.description: This comprehensive summary sheet / cheat sheet covering everything from basic SELECT statements to advanced joins, subqueries, and query optimization. Perfect for anyone looking to boost their database skills and efficiency.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 1: Understanding SQL and Databases
item.description: In the world of information technology, databases are the backbone of virtually every application and system. They serve as efficient repositories of structured data, enabling businesses to store, manage, and retrieve vast amounts of information with ease. To interact with these databases, we rely on a powerful and versatile language known as SQL (Structured Query Language).
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: The Hidden Masters
item.description: Indexing the hidden master blog links

item.title: Blogrolls #1
item.description: While surfing the web I came across this blogroll which might interest you.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Creating a Synchronized Scrolling Two-Column Layout
item.description: Learn how to create a synchronized scrolling two-column layout with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This tutorial will guide you through making a responsive design where main content scrolls vertically and images scroll horizontally in parallel.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 5: Advanced SQL Filtering - How to Refine Your Queries for Better Data Insights
item.description: This chapter covers intricate WHERE conditions, pattern matching, range filtering, and null checking, providing clear examples and explanations. Learn to leverage SQL's powerful capabilities for managing and analyzing data.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 4: SQL Aliases - Learn How to Improve Query Readability and Maintainability
item.description: Learn how SQL aliases can make your queries cleaner and easier to understand. This article breaks down how to use aliases for columns and tables, with simple explanations and practical examples. Discover how these handy tools can help you write more readable and maintainable SQL code.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto
